name: Mindjacked
description:
Mindjacked is a psychological horror game/visual novel, set in a sci-fi environment.

As you navigate through the game,  you'll be facing  numerous decisions, that will heavily impact how events play out, and how your character deals with certain situations. Which is important, as you further descend into a mind and reality bending story.

Mindjacked deals with various topics, such as what is reality, consciousness, life... and the implications of your answers to these questions.
At first, it is all about getting out, escaping a claustrophobic situation, where   the lines between what is real and what isn't, are starting to erode.
Your goal is to navigate through the challenges of retaining your sanity, and figuring out what really is going on.

Thank you for giving Mindjacked a shot! It is truly appreciated.
If you enjoy the game, please consider supporting its development over on Patreon.

Thank you!
